definitions.definition: put forward (an idea or plan) for consideration or discussion by others.
examples: he proposed a new nine-point peace plan

definitions.definition: nominate (someone) for an elected office or as a member of a society.
put forward (a motion) to a legislature or committee.
examples: the government put its slim majority to the test by proposing a vote of confidence

definitions.definition: make an offer of marriage to someone.
examples: I have already proposed to Sarah
synonyms: offer marriage; Moreinformalpop the question; datedask for someone's hand in marriage "you've proposed to her!"
